requirements: Prerequisites: ART 132 and 264, or permission of instructor.
description:
Various ways that design functions; how visual communication takes form and is recognized by an audience. Core issues inherent in design: word and image, structure, and sequence. Analysis and refinement of an individual design methodology. Attention to systematic procedures, techniques, and modes of inquiry that lead to a particular result. Materials fee: $150.
Prerequisites: ART 132 and 264, or permission of instructor.
title: Graphic Design Methodologies
